description: Statuses posted to the given account.

request.name: :id
request.comment: REQUIRED String. The ID of the Account in the database.

request.name: Authorization
request.comment: Provide this header with Bearer <user token> to gain authorized access to this API method.

request.name: max_id
request.comment: String. All results returned will be lesser than this ID. In effect, sets an upper bound on results.

request.name: since_id
request.comment: String. All results returned will be greater than this ID. In effect, sets a lower bound on results.

request.name: min_id
request.comment: String. Returns results immediately newer than this ID. In effect, sets a cursor at this ID and paginates forward.

request.name: limit
request.comment: Integer. Maximum number of results to return. Defaults to 20 statuses. Max 40 statuses.

request.name: only_media
request.comment: Boolean. Filter out statuses without attachments.

request.name: exclude_replies
request.comment: Boolean. Filter out statuses in reply to a different account.

request.name: exclude_reblogs
request.comment: Boolean. Filter out boosts from the response.

request.name: pinned
request.comment: Boolean. Filter for pinned statuses only. Defaults to false, which includes all statuses. Pinned statuses do not receive special priority in the order of the returned results.

request.name: tagged
request.comment: String. Filter for statuses using a specific hashtag.
